name: Roman Compline
tagline: booklet for singing Compline at home
body:
### Pray the easiest hour of the Divine Office

Here is the booklet we use each night.  Everything is there with music in square notes and English translations.

Download compline.pdf and print, either as an A5 booklet or scale up the 108 pages to be extra easy on the eyes.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
